statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_flow_data ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, vehicle_count FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE avg_speed > 60;
SELECT AVG(avg_speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_flow_data GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT MAX(vehicle_count) AS max_count, MIN(vehicle_count) AS min_count FROM traffic_flow_data;
SELECT * FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE location_id = 1 AND time_stamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location_id, time_stamp, vehicle_count, avg_speed FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE avg_speed > 60 AND vehicle_count > 20 ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT location_id, AVG(avg_speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_flow_data GROUP BY location_id HAVING AVG(avg_speed) > 50 ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY location_id, time_stamp;
SELECT location_id, SUM(vehicle_count) AS total_vehicle_count FROM traffic_flow_data GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY total_vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT id, status, signal_name FROM traffic_signals ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, status FROM traffic_signals WHERE status='Active';
SELECT signal_name, location FROM traffic_signals WHERE location='Main Street';
SELECT flow_id, traffic_volume, vehicle_speed FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE traffic_volume > 100;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals WHERE status = 'green' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT signal_name, location FROM traffic_signals WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 ORDER BY flow_time ASC;
SELECT signal_name, location, status FROM traffic_signals WHERE location LIKE '%avenue%';
SELECT signal_id, flow_time, traffic_volume FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE vehicle_speed > 50 ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC, flow_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals
SELECT location, current_status FROM traffic_signals
SELECT signal_id, location, traffic_volume FROM traffic_signals WHERE traffic_volume > 100
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT signal_id, green_time, yellow_time, red_time FROM signal_timing
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT signal_id, location, current_status FROM traffic_signals WHERE location LIKE 'Downtown%' ORDER BY signal_id;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, vehicle_count, average_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_count > 50 AND average_speed < 60.0;
SELECT signal_id, green_time, yellow_time, red_time FROM signal_timing WHERE signal_id = 3;
SELECT signal_id, location, current_status, traffic_volume FROM traffic_signals WHERE current_status = 'Operational' ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT id, intersection_name, timestamp FROM traffic_signals WHERE intersection_name = 'Main Street';
SELECT current_signal FROM traffic_signals WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT sensor_id, vehicle_count, congestion_level FROM traffic_sensor_data ORDER BY vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT timestamp, log_message FROM traffic_signal_logs WHERE signal_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, intersection_name, timestamp, current_signal FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT * FROM traffic_sensor_data WHERE vehicle_count > 100 AND average_speed < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT intersection_name, timestamp FROM traffic_signals WHERE current_signal = 'RED' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 12:00:00';

SELECT sensor_id, vehicle_count, congestion_level FROM traffic_sensor_data WHERE congestion_level = 'HIGH' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 00:00:00' ORDER BY vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT signal_id, timestamp, previous_signal, new_signal FROM traffic_signal_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM traffic_lights;
SELECT id, location, signal_color FROM traffic_lights WHERE location='Main Street';
SELECT camera_type, status FROM traffic_cameras WHERE id=1;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY pattern_name DESC;
SELECT id, speed, vehicle_count FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE speed > 60 AND vehicle_count < 10;
SELECT id, location, signal_color FROM traffic_lights WHERE signal_color = 'red';
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = true ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, camera_id, speed, vehicle_count FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE speed > 60 AND vehicle_count > 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM traffic_patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%traffic%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, optimization_info FROM optimization_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
